title: How to Do the Ditman Glitch on Resident Evil 4

steps.headline: Use your controller to select the striker gun.
steps.description: This is different on each game console. However, all controllers allow you to "scroll through" your weapons until your select the correct one.

steps.headline: Aim your striker at your desired target or enemy.
Press the inventory button.
steps.description: Press the inventory button quickly and again scroll through your weapons. You must do this before the "laser" beam appears on screen.

steps.headline: Select an additional gun to your liking.
steps.description: Don't be shy; feel free to try different combination.

steps.headline: Fire away at the enemy.
steps.description: The Ditman glitch allows you to take video game play to the next level on Resident Evil 4, as you now will be able to fire both guns at once.

text: Use your controller to select the striker gun. This is different on each game console. However, all controllers allow you to "scroll through" your weapons until your select the correct one. Aim your striker at your desired target or enemy.  Press the inventory button. Press the inventory button quickly and again scroll through your weapons. You must do this before the "laser" beam appears on screen. Select an additional gun to your liking. Don't be shy; feel free to try different combination. Fire away at the enemy. The Ditman glitch allows you to take video game play to the next level on Resident Evil 4, as you now will be able to fire both guns at once.
